data.description: DNS Zone file parser, database and signer.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module s used to provide an object for storing zone files, it
    is tightly integrated with Net::DNS and Net::DNS::SEC. The object
    represent a DNS Zone.

    I discussed the use of this namespace with Chris Reinardt the
    maintainer of Net::DNS.
